TESTIMONIALS.review: I've tried a lot of productivity apps before but this one really hits the nail! I forgot that I really was a lazy guy.
TESTIMONIALS.name: Jasper Cruz

TESTIMONIALS.review: Just having your tasks sorted out makes it easier to execute. Immerse never fails to put me in the the zone.
TESTIMONIALS.name: Yna Cheng

TESTIMONIALS.review: Self promises and verbal commitments are now a thing of the past, having a tool that sorts and manages your tasks for you is the new productive.
TESTIMONIALS.name: Vin
TESTIMONIALS.designation: Technological Institute of the Philippines, Senior

TESTIMONIALS.review: Thesis, backlogs, projects. I was still able to party because Immerse helped me manage my workload. I never realized I had a lot of vacant time.
TESTIMONIALS.name: Renzel Austria
TESTIMONIALS.designation: National College of Business and Arts, Sophomore.

TRANSACTIONS_FEATURE.title: Create a detailed todo-list.
TRANSACTIONS_FEATURE.des: Be it partying, socializing, working or your daily household chores. Immerse will make sure you keep track of everything.

TRANSACTIONS_FEATURE.title: Write important notes and docs.
TRANSACTIONS_FEATURE.des: The productivity suite also gives you a compact note locker, safely store important notes and save documents..

TRANSACTIONS_FEATURE.title: Eliminate Distractions.
TRANSACTIONS_FEATURE.des: Our AppLocker guarantees you get your tasks finished first by temporarily locking your attention-draining applications.

TRANSACTIONS_FEATURE.title: Enjoy more free time.
TRANSACTIONS_FEATURE.des: A walk to the park, playing video games or just doing literally anything, Immerse makes sure you get there!

PROOFS_FEATURE.title: Task Manager (To-Do)
PROOFS_FEATURE.des: Easily create and execute daily tasks.

PROOFS_FEATURE.title: Notebook
PROOFS_FEATURE.des: Write important notes and store articles.

PROOFS_FEATURE.title: App Locker
PROOFS_FEATURE.des: Stay focused by temporarily stopping other apps.

PROOFS_FEATURE.title: Study Timer
PROOFS_FEATURE.des: Catch the clock with timer templates.

PROOFS_FEATURE.title: Budget Tracker
PROOFS_FEATURE.des: Never lose a dime with the budget tracker.

BETA_FEATURE.title: Report Bugs in 2 Taps
BETA_FEATURE.des: We devs always keep track of our services.

BETA_FEATURE.title: 24/7 Support
BETA_FEATURE.des: Immerse Staff is always here for you, 'round-the-clock.

BETA_FEATURE.title: Try and Test
BETA_FEATURE.des: We mix and match features that are useful
